item.title: Briargrove Southern Charm Remodel: Part 3
item.description: In case you missed the first two posts about this Briargrove whole-home remodel, take a look here! When we took on this project the overall layout of the home did not need many changes; however, the finishes were ready for some updates. In this week’s series, we’re sharing the before and afters of the bedrooms and bathrooms. The home featured a kid’s study nook with built-ins that we ripped out in order to transform the space for added functionality for a nursery.

item.title: Briargrove Southern Charm Remodel: Part 1
item.description: On Point is known for our custom design + build program; however, we also love helping clients transform their existing home with major remodel projects! In this three-part series, we’re showing you the before and afters of this Briargrove home that needed a major facelift. On Point took on the challenge of updating this house without altering the overall footprint. We did update every surface, fixture and finish for the entire interior and exterior and came back and added a freestanding outdoor entertaining space complete with a wood-burning fireplace, surround sound, TV and ample seating.
